#  Corporate Information 

Li Auto Inc. is a leader in China’s new energy vehicle market. The Company designs, develops, manufactures, and sells premium smart electric vehicles. Its mission is: Create a Mobile Home, Create Happiness (创造移动的家,创造幸福的家). Through innovations in product, technology, and business model, the Company provides families with safe, convenient, and comfortable products and services. Li Auto is a pioneer in successfully commercializing extended-range electric vehicles in China. While firmly advancing along this technological route, it builds platforms for battery electric vehicles in parallel. The Company leverages technology to create value for users. It concentrates its in-house development efforts on proprietary range extension systems, innovative electric vehicle technologies, and smart vehicle solutions. The Company started volume production in November 2019. Its current model lineup includes Li MEGA, a high-tech flagship family MPV, Li L9, a six-seat flagship family SUV, Li L8, a six-seat premium family SUV, Li L7, a five-seat flagship family SUV, and Li L6, a five-seat premium family SUV. The Company will continue to expand its product lineup to target a broader user base.

#  Corporate Information 

The Board of Directors of Li Auto Inc. (the "Company") sets high standards for the Company's employees, officers and directors. Implicit in this philosophy is the importance of sound corporate governance. It is the duty of the Board of Directors to serve as a prudent fiduciary for shareholders and to oversee the management of the Company's business. To fulfill its responsibilities and to discharge its duty, the Board of Directors follows the procedures and standards that are set forth in these guidelines. These guidelines are subject to modification from time to time as the Board of Directors deems appropriate in the best interests of the Company or as required by applicable laws and regulations.

## Committee Composition

links.content:
[ Skip to main navigation ](#main-menu)

[ ![logo](/sites/g/files/knoqqb90086/themes/site/nir_pid3704/client/images/updated/logoEnglish.svg) ![logo](/sites/g/files/knoqqb90086/themes/site/nir_pid3704/client/images/updated/logoCn.png) ](https://www.lixiang.com/) ![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb90086/themes/site/nir_pid3704/client/images/logo.png)

  *     * [English](/investor-faqs)
    * [简体中文](/zh-hans/touzizhechangjianwenti)
    * [繁體中文](/zh-hant/investor-faqs)



  *     * [English](/investor-faqs)
    * [简体中文](/zh-hans/touzizhechangjianwenti)
    * [繁體中文](/zh-hant/investor-faqs)



#  Investor Resources 

[Show All](#)

1. What is Li Auto Inc.’s business?

Li Auto Inc. is a leader in China’s new energy vehicle market. The Company designs, develops, manufactures, and sells premium smart electric vehicles. Its mission is: Create a Mobile Home, Create Happiness (创造移动的家,创造幸福的家). Through innovations in product, technology, and business model, the Company provides families with safe, convenient, and comfortable products and services. Li Auto is a pioneer in successfully commercializing extended-range electric vehicles in China. While firmly advancing along this technological route, it builds platforms for battery electric vehicles in parallel. The Company leverages technology to create value for users. It concentrates its in-house development efforts on proprietary range extension systems, innovative electric vehicle technologies, and smart vehicle solutions. The Company started volume production in November 2019. Its current model lineup includes Li MEGA, a high-tech flagship family MPV, Li L9, a six-seat flagship family SUV, Li L8, a six-seat premium family SUV, Li L7, a five-seat flagship family SUV, and Li L6, a five-seat premium family SUV. The Company will continue to expand its product lineup to target a broader user base. 

2. Where is Li Auto Inc.’s corporate headquarters located?

Our headquarters is located in Beijing, China. Li Auto Inc. R&D Headquarters, Number 11 of Wenliang Street, Shunyi District, Beijing 101399 People's Republic of China +86 (10) 8742-7209 Website: ir.lixiang.com

3. How many employees does Li Auto Inc. have? 

We had 31,591 employees as of December 31, 2023.

4. When does Li Auto Inc.'s fiscal year end?

Li Auto Inc.’s fiscal year ends on December 31.

5. On which exchange is Li Auto Inc.’s stock traded and what is the ticker symbol?

Li Auto Inc.'s American Depositary Shares (ADSs) have been listed on the Nasdaq Global Select Market since July 30, 2020, under the symbol “LI". On August 12, 2021, Li Auto successfully completed its Dual Primary Listing on the Main Board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, stock code: 02015.HK.

6. How many Li Auto Inc.’s ordinary shares does one American Depositary Share ("ADS") of the Company represent?

Each ADS of Li Auto Inc. represents two Class A ordinary shares.

7. How can I obtain a copy of Li Auto Inc.’s Annual Report?

Annual reports will be available via this website. All SEC and HKEX documents are also accessible online through the SEC and HKEX Filings page respectively.

8. Where can I get a copy of Li Auto’s HKEX filings?

As part of the Company’s efforts to be more environmentally conscious and in response to the amendments to the Hong Kong Listing Rules, which mandate the electronic dissemination of corporate communications by HKEX-listed issuers, Li Auto will distribute its HKEX filings to our shareholders by electronic means and only make available hardcopies upon request, starting 2024. These HKEX filings comprise those issued or to be issued by the Company for the information or action of its securities holders or the investing public, including but not limited to interim and annual reports, ESG reports, meeting notices, proxy forms, circulars, and listing documents.

Electronic copies of the Company’s HKEX filings can be accessed and downloaded on our[ IR website](https://ir.lixiang.com/) and the website of the [Hong Kong Stock Exchange](https://www.hkexnews.hk/).

For shareholders who wish to request hardcopies for certain HKEX filings, we have sent a notification letter to the address of each [registered shareholder](https://www1.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2024/0131/2024013100384.pdf) and [non-registered shareholder](https://www1.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2024/0131/2024013100408.pdf) kept within our Hong Kong share registrar, which, among others, enables shareholders to make such requests.

9. How can I contact Li Auto Inc.’s Investor Relations Department?

Li Auto Inc. Investor Relations E-mail: ir@lixiang.com
